description: Ensure pages include a skip link to bypass repeated navigation.
recommendation: Add a visually-hidden skip link that targets the main content region. (WCAG 2.1 SC 2.4.1)
algorithm: Checks for a skip link (href="#..." with "skip" label) as the first focusable element and flags missing or later placement.
algorithm_advanced: Locates skip link anchors (href starting '#', label containing 'skip') and ensures it is the first focusable element; otherwise reports missing or out-of-order.
